My Sample Lesson in a Folder

By Fred Gibbs

    Reviewed by Caleb McDaniel
    Recommended for Beginning Users

This is my new lesson! How is the URL?

About the author

Fred Gibbs is an assistant professor of history at the University of New Mexico.  

This lesson is currently under review and may contain errors.
